about_the_game:
Welcome to "Red Thread," a unique singleplayer strategy card game narrative sim that intricately weaves the complex tapestry of relationships and personal ambitions. In this captivating world, every connection counts, and your choices shape the journey of your life.

Gameplay:

At the heart of "Red Thread" is a dynamic card deck representing different people you encounter throughout your life. Each card embodies unique personalities, strengths, and weaknesses, influencing your path to achieving your life goals. Strategically build your network by forging new relationships and nurturing existing ones. But beware, as not all relationships are beneficial—some may challenge your progress and test your resolve.

Your objective is to navigate through various life scenarios—from professional aspirations to personal growth—all while balancing the delicate act of maintaining your social circle. Make choices in critical moments that will either strengthen or strain your connections, impacting your success and the unfolding narrative.

Features:

  • Deep Narrative Simulation: Immerse yourself in a story-rich experience where each decision influences your character’s future and alters the game's outcome.
  • Strategic Card Gameplay: Manage a deck of character cards, each with unique traits. Decide whom to trust, whom to rely on, and whom to keep at a distance.
  • Dynamic Relationship Mechanisms: Experience the joys and challenges of friendships and rivalries. Watch relationships evolve in response to your actions and decisions.
  • Life Goal Progression: Set your sights on various life goals. Work towards achievements like career success, personal development, or creative pursuits, supported or hindered by your network.
  • Beautiful Art Style: Enjoy a visually engaging game with a distinctive art style that brings the characters and story to life.
